website_summaries.verdict: This well-made vacuum is made by a top brand and does a decent job tackling pet hair, despite a few performance concerns.
pros: DuoClean floor head transitions easily form hard floors to carpet
Canister lifts away from the unit for cleaning tough spots like ceilings and stairs
cons: Anti-wrap feature intended to keep pet hairs from tangling around the brush roll doesn't always work as expected

customer_reviews.title: At last no tangles
customer_reviews.text: This is the third vacuum cleaner I have bought in the last year. My problem was always my long hair and my sewing and knitting threads. Even when I bought a vac with no rotating brush the insides got all wrapped with long hair. So far I love this one with no trouble with tangled brushes. The lift off section was easy to use on the stairs. The small head was a bit noisy echoing on the stairs but cleaned really well. I think I have found the one that is right for me and I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K.

customer_reviews.title: The best VAC ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleaner I have ever bought - and there have been a few! Our dog and two cats can cause domestic havoc and nothing seemed to clear up before we found Sharkie!!!! Wonderful. Our rugs came up like new, the amount of hair and dust was visible and so much - we are ashamed to say that we are quite excited to run the cleaner around. Works just as well on hard floors and finds dirt I didnt know was there. It is a little heavy so not really suitable for anyone with disabilities but if you want a clean home - this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Shark on the strength of its reviews but sadly it did not live up to the hype. While it does clean very well indeed it is not a joy to use. I can best describe it as "flappy". Bits keep falling off, the hose keeps detatching from the main unit and the whole thing just feels poorly made. Also, the dust collection cylinder is *tiny*, meaning that you'll probably need to empty it on each use. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Anti-hair wrap really works
customer_reviews.text: I have been very impressed with this hoover. It has good suction, easy to manoeuvre, simple to use the tools and lift away mechanism and also very easy to empty as the dust bucket opens top and bottom. I was sceptical about the anti-hair wrap, but with two daughters with very long hair I have not had to clean the brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot fault this, it is fantastic. We have two cats and our old hoover was struggling to cope. This machine is brilliant easy to put together and use. The option to lift away is very useful for stairs. My 12 year old son will happily hoover the whole house on a regular basis using this vacuum so I would recommend for that reason alone 😉. The only slight niggle I have is there is no storage for attachments or if there is we have not discovered it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie C

customer_reviews.title: If you want a Shark, but a Dyson.
customer_reviews.text: Decided after having several Dyson that I would buy a shark. Generally hear positives but.... - this Shark claims “anti-hair wrap” technology; see photos. It’s no easy to clear the hair away.... - it’s not as light or manoeuvrable as a Dyson - suction is ok, I’ve had better What I do like is the led lights that help you see what you’re vacuuming under cupboards etc.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Anti hair wrap did not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. Bought specifically for anti wrap pet hair. So looking forward to hoovering and not having to de hair the brush etc. After hoovering looked underneath, loads of wrapped pet hair. Unfortunately I would not recommend. Might work if you have a dog that does not shed/moult very much or a tortoise but it obviously was not tested to remove long haired German Shepherd Dog hair. Back to using my old Shark then detangling.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: the hoover does not do what shark claim
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hoover for 3 months or so used it yesterday and found a problem with the suction, after having a close look at the brush i found it completely jammed with hair. shark is stating the brush cannot be tangled with hair because of the front bar so i call this false advertisement and returning it to Amazon. please think before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Anti hair wrap technology!!
customer_reviews.text: As u can see from the photos it really isn’t anti hair rap technology. Also u cannot take the roller brush out like u can on the basic shark. Waste of a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Miss S J Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Dyson Animal, I find it heavier than the Dyson and more difficult to manoeuvre on carpet it pulls my back when manoeuvring round furniture. It picks up well and picks up dog hair well, but if you pick up a small pebble or a piece of dried dog food it rattler around the inner chamber until you empty it. I do like the way it detaches to hoover the stairs. I am disappointed with this purchase and wish I had stayed with Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: D A Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It was too heavy for me, it did not clear hair from the brushes, I tried to remove the head to clear the hair that were wrapped around the bristles. As the screws to release the head would not budge, I had to clear the brush using scissors. The power is okay but I just cannot manage it. I very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with the results!
customer_reviews.text: I had promised myself this for ages because we had been using a cheap vacuum that kept breaking. I have a long white haired dog that casts and the shark copes with this no problem. I am delighted with the results! The lift away is great for doing the stairs and the different features are so easy to use and the headlights show that you are getting the dust and grime. It was worth every penny and the amount of dust that came out of my carpet during first use was unbelievable, definelty worth getting you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Returned😔
customer_reviews.text: Loved this when it arrived Great suction Then I noticed on first use the hose would not stay attached to the hover Weird just small ball and socket Sure they could do better I could not deal with spending all this money and have hose flapping round my bad knee So sadly went straight back in the box and returned
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Does not fulfil promises
customer_reviews.text: This product was returned as it did not do what was promised on the box! It was supposed to cut hairs to stop them going round the roller. Did not cut the hairs and they were all wrapped around the roller. Waste of money, so not believe all the hype about the vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dyson v Shark
customer_reviews.text: Have been using a Dyson for many years however just fed up with them breaking down all the time. So thought it was time to try a different model. Have to admit very happy with the Shark. The suction power is way more than the Dyson. The only downside of this is the capacity could be more as have to empty it more often. Also not as movable as the Dyson ball. But would I go back to a Dyson? No Shark has my vote.
customer_reviews.author: Amandeep S.

customer_reviews.title: The Best of the best.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this machine, with a house full of girls with waist length hair and a long haired cat, this just cleans it up like its nothing, easy to empty, so powerful, really cleans deep down. As a person who goes through a lot of vacuum cleaners, i can honestly say that this is the best by far. Even the top of the range ones you can buy, i have had them all. This is my new favourite toy.
customer_reviews.author: ViolentHippi

customer_reviews.title: Resonable
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy machine but good suction the clip for holing the hose in place is not strong enough as the hose keeps coming out
customer_reviews.author: Ken Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Expected better
customer_reviews.text: I’m having some trouble with this shark, I would appreciate a call from someone at Shark as I do feel my product is faulty, I’ve only really used it for one month in total and I genuinely feel it’s lost it’s power... I’m pretty disappointed to be honest as I’ve been looking forward to getting this product for years. I feel like I need to purchase a second hoover now as this one isn’t doing the job properly ... I really am disappointed especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Holland

customer_reviews.title: Not cordless
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing It’s appears cordless which is what I wanted ..it’s heavy cumbersome and no flexi head on ...would like to send back and replace with cordless dison... Should be clearer that the item is not cordless ....the images ,and reading suggests it is ...
customer_reviews.author: Jane Potter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Amazing vacuum cleaner. I have 2 cats & the hair this cleaner picks up is amazing. I love the lift away feature & the pet attachment which is great for sofas & the stairs. This vacuum cleaner is an upright & cylinder in one. Love the headlights when cleaning under sofa or beds! I bought on a Black Friday deal. Having had the vacuum for a few weeks now, I would honestly have paid £300 for it because it really is that good. Worth every penny - I feel my house is much cleaner now!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol R

customer_reviews.title: Three best vacuum cleaner that I've had
customer_reviews.text: My Shark has just been delivered and I have vacuumed the whole house. It's a bit heavier than I expected but it's very vanouverable. The light shows up the dust a great addition but the dust collector is a bit small. I will willingly recommend the Shark.
customer_reviews.author: June Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner, but some minor niggles
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a present for family members, but we have one almost identical. The liftaway is great, but the wand for stairs, curtains etc. is a little cumbersome and inflexible. It is difficult to clean car interiors and round a stairlift for example. It would be good to be able to just have a hose upon which to fix the attachments direct. The hose itself, like Dysons, is too rigid, and stretching it just ends up with the undesirable effect of knocking the body over. Despite these criticisms, the cleaner has great suction power, is easy to empty and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: It's better than any other on the Market 1000%
customer_reviews.text: I love it , it really beats Dyson because I have had two of them and neither were any good. I also bought a Vax pet the wand type that you have to charge .I had it a week then sent it back because it's rubbish, I call it a glorified Ubank . The price of the Vax pet and the Shark is around ten pounds more on the Shark , and the Shark beats them hands down . It has fantastic suction, I have the one with the pet one with anti hair wrap . Thank you for making a Shark Vacuum, if I could give 1000% I would do .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but heavy
customer_reviews.text: The suction power is excellent compared with my Dyson cordless(rop of the range) However I expected that comparing a cordless to cable shark. The anti hair facility works very well with no clogging. On stairs I found it to be both lightweight and versatile. It is so easy moving from carpet to hard floor at a press of a button. I would have give it 5*except for one reason. On carpets it is manoeuvrable but I find it very heavy to use. This is no good for frail or elderly due to that. As such I classed it as 4star.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I can’t believe how much this sucks up. I hoovered on Monday, then my family came to visit, there were a couple of boys on the carpet from opening presents so I gave it a quick hoover and I couldn’t believe how much it picked up just from one day. It feels so clean every time I hoover. It’s still quite heavy and the lift away is no cordless but I’ve always been disappointed with the power of a cordless and battery life. The cleaning power of this makes up for the drawbacks of not having a cordless.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Idiotproof and worth the money.  And cheaper than the Dyson hype.
customer_reviews.text: As owner of 2 destructive furbabies, the shark is wayyy better than Dysons and the like. Easy to assemble, disassemble, manoeuvre etc etc. The bit I really like is when I start it up, theres no mini particles jumping out giving me an wheezing attack like what I get with other hoovers because of its double filter or whatever it's called.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Cat lady

customer_reviews.title: Early days but far better than Dyson
customer_reviews.text: We have new carpet fitted and have been using a Dyson corded animal vac, my wife was away for a wile so I had to do the vacuuming, talk about a work out, so doing a load or research found that the Dyson had no hight or vac adjustment and that is what is needed, this vac is so easy to push around and the amount that it picked up was amazing it has a setting for carpet and hard floor and the suction can be adjusted to, I have been a life long Dyson fan but not any more, this will out preform our newish Dyson with ease oh and it is quite to.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dgt Whidden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaner, am very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for a smaller upright. I’d not heard of this company but the reviews were very good. I am very pleased. It is very versatile, The main body can be easily detached and can be carried separately with attachments to do stairs. There are several great attachments which can be added to the long section for ease of getting in corners. The suction is powerful but can be varied easily. I was surprised at how much dust it picked up and it has really made a different to carpets. It can also be used on hard surfaces. Overall, I would highly recommend and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J

customer_reviews.title: Bye Henry !
customer_reviews.text: For years I have had Henry Hoovers - however finally gave in and decided to get this mainly due to the anti hair wrap and a permanently moulting Greek Rescue dog. Oh my word - this far exceeds my expectations. I went over a previously hoovered spot and was amazed at what came up - suction power is amazing. Stairs are now a doddle and it is so easy when cleaning the car as the lift away is small enough to sit on the seat why you vacuum which makes the task easier & a lot quicker. Very happy that I decided to switch and will never go back.
customer_reviews.author: Angeline Owen

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: Modular nature of the machine is great in that you can take various bits of it apart to conduct different tasks (for example the suction hose & motor unit can be detached from the main body to make the cleaning the stairs easier. Suction power great, tools good. much better than the last 2 dysons cleaners that we have had. Good hard floors & Carpets (different settings), good for stairs (although not the lightest, being able to detach the motor unit a plus) and also good for the car (we bought the additional car tools). Overall Really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchy

customer_reviews.title: That the vacuum has to be returned.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the vacuum three times, I am very unhappy with the results. It has caused me problems, The hose keeps coming out from the clip and I find that I have to pick up bits. after vacuuming. The suction is powerful but the brushes appear not to be working too well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: Suction excellent, manoeuvrability easy and responsive, really lifts the carpet pile and responds instantly to tiled floors. Really does keep the air well filtered and not a hint of smell or a sign of dust particles, until you notice what is in the dust box!! Criticism is that use on stairs is okay, but the cleaner is a bit on the heavy side and awkward to manipulate on each tread; not its strongest asset! Great cleaner value for money, more than compensates for its weight!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Brent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, excellent functionality range.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality vacuum for hard floors and carpets. I live in a house with cats, dogs and girls work long hair so I needed something that is good at lifting hair from carpet and furniture, this is excellent. Really smooth to operate, a bit heavey on the turn out pulls apart really easily for lighter work. Had a Miele CX1 Powerline before and this a much better vacuum, might not have the top line power of the Miele but much better to actually vacuum with it's excellent roller design.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Payne

customer_reviews.title: Prefer the old Dyson!
customer_reviews.text: Not a Dyson, falls over a great deal when using the hose, not at all stable.. cord position is a pain and if it catches a lamps power cable it will chew right through the wire exposing the live electric cable. Fills up quickly.. Wouldn’t buy again..
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Real quality product, the packaging is top notch and really easy to assemble, no tools required. The suction power is immense. We have 3 kids and two dogs and it deals with their mess no problem. We've always had Dyson's before but i feel the Shark is better. Why only 4 stars? Purely because I feel the dust chamber is not big enough. It needs emptying every 10 minutes! Still all said the best vacuum cleaner we have ever brought
customer_reviews.author: Mr A P Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: My third shark and most definatly the worst... I find the more you spend the poorer they become at hoovering..
customer_reviews.author: Jomck

customer_reviews.title: Great little sucker
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an earlier model Shark which had served us faithfully for many years, this one has all the same features and more, this product is able to be taken apart and reduced in size to clean the car and stairs and has an improved accessory attachment. Also the hair unclogging system really works, we have a dog, cat and wife with long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Review Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely hoover! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product easy to use uprig. And can take off section so you hold it. Only bad points I would say is that the electric wire personally I think is not long enough and the dust waste could be a little bigger other than that really super happy with it! So easy to use different parts and easy to put it back together aswell!
customer_reviews.author: L.b

customer_reviews.title: The hair wrap feature is a non event.
customer_reviews.text: The anti hair wrap feature simply does not work. We have a long haired dog and the hairs wrap around the brushes just the same as any other floor type vacuum cleaner. I spend 10 minutes after each use de-thatching the brushes. Advertising this cleaner as an anti hair wrap product is totally wrong. I defy any Shark representative to come and show me how their feature is supposed to work - it certainly does not do the job. Apart from that - the cleaner is nearly as good as our Dyson on carpet but not as good as our Henry for power.
customer_reviews.author: Mr L of Horsham

customer_reviews.title: Most impressive vacuum owned in 40+ years
customer_reviews.text: Positives Excellent suction which gives instantly visual difference when using on carpets. Very easy to switch between floor types options. Really useful variable suction option. Love the lightweight Lift Away feature and generous cable length - makes stair and high level cleaning less of a chore. Negatives Find the flexible hose on the short side. The upholstery tool tends to come off the accessory post when the vacuum is reclined in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love,love,love this hoover
customer_reviews.text: Love, love,love this hoover, worth every penny, great suction my carpets look fantastic has raised the pile again on them. Great gadget for stairs and upholstery, easy to assemble and very easy to use ad handheld unit. It is a bit on the heavy side and the swivel head can take some getting used to but probably the best hoover I have ever brought and I've tried all the major ones. Wouldn't swap it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for pet owners and long hair. Brilliant suction.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Shark. Excellent suction. Lots of attachments. Brilliant in carpets and rugs. No hair wrap tech is a life saver with girls long hair and dogs. Isn’t the lightest vacuum I’ve owned but definitely manageable with lift off ability. Cable is long so can go room to room without unplugging. Dust collection is small so do have to empty regularly but maybe that’s because it’s picking up so much more dust!! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: AKH

customer_reviews.title: Very upset
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely rubbish I need to exchange it says I had 1 month to return it
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Up there with the best of them.
customer_reviews.text: This may be the best vacuum cleaner I’ve ever used. Slightly on the heavy side, I admit. I know four people that purchased one and they rave about it. I mean, I figured ‘a hoover is a hoover, right?’ WRONG! Honestly you just have to use it to understand - I couldn’t articulate how amazing it really is. Fantastic for pet hair too, a real godsend. I mean after all, it’s just a hoover..... right?
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Suction is AMAZING..!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble following the clear instructions. I’ve only tried it once to test it out -after if hoovered with my old vax -and I can’t believe how much more dirt it has picked up..! The suction is amazing..! It will be interesting to see how I get on manoeuvring the hoover as I’m not used to such a flexible product and it’s not all that light. So far so good though..! I’m looking forward to cleaning again haha..!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: We have been loyal Dyson customers for many years, having owned at least 5 of their models in succession. When we fully exhausted our most recent Dyson model we asked around for a recommendation. The Shark vac was mentioned more than any other. It has lived up to its promise in terms of cleaning ability, and the facility of adjusting the strength of suction has proved useful. It is very good at retrieving the many excess hairs of our golden retriever! It is still heavier than we would like (we are both in our seventies), and although it is much more manoeuvrable than a Dyson the weight can limit this feature. All in all we are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GORDON BELL

customer_reviews.title: Love my Shark!
customer_reviews.text: Picked up things i couldn't even see, love the anti hair wrap, just what i needed! The lights are fab and it's so quiet. Quite heavy on your arms when hoovering and i find the nozzles don't go on their holders easily, could do with more flex on the small head for the stairs as it's hard to get the angle. But its all stuff you can work around for a great vacuum
customer_reviews.author: karrie lee

customer_reviews.title: Certainly does the job.
customer_reviews.text: The Shark makes light work of my dog's hair, relatively easy to move it around as well. My only gripes are: The cable retaining clip keeps falling off, not strong enough to stay attached to the power cable, and the hose retaining clip fell out almost immediately, there doesn't seem to be any way to fix it. Irritating , but not enough to downgrade the machine. Very happy with the performance. Easy to use on stairs too.
customer_reviews.author: moyna

customer_reviews.title: Great hoover. Great suction. A joy
customer_reviews.text: Love my hoover. Was so excited when it arrived. Great suction. My house has never been cleaner. I look forward to using it. It glides over my hard floor no problem. Great suction on rugs and carpet. The only thing is it is quite heavy. I'm OK with it but it may be a bit heavy for someone older or who has back problems. But apart from that it's a win for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sallycinnamon

customer_reviews.title: New shark anti wrap hoover
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this hoover. I have three dogs, and have previously used a dyson cordless. Which I was unimpressed with. Always running out of charge, blocked with hair easerly. The shark is brilliant, really easy to do stairs. The only setback is it’s a bit heavy and the lead gets in the way. I couldn’t believe How. I have hair it picked up the first time I used it. So obviously the dyson wasn’t as efficient and I thought. Thank you. Would really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda walker

customer_reviews.title: Best hoover I had had.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I have both got long hair and this has caused the death of every hoover I've had. Then, I bought this bad boy, wow! It is brilliant! The suction is amazing, it's brought my rug up like new. It really does suck up hair no probs!! Just press the button and it changes to hard floor. It's so quiet! I give it a big fat 10/10. Buy it, you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: LR.

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I’ve ever owned ( see review)
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best vacuum I’ve ever had ... keep your Dysons et al ... everything feels so much cleaner & kicks up less dust to settle . My only criticisms are the flex is a bit short , the hose keeper tends to pop out & not stay put ( not a major issue ) & it’s heavy but I forgive that because of the performance . Easy empty dust bucket . Small turbo brush is fab for furniture .
customer_reviews.author: T.T.

customer_reviews.title: Very good with cat hair
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner has a huge suction and copes well with cat hair. However it is a very heavy vacuum cleaner and not very maneuverable. it also comes to pieces to clean the filters etc which takes some getting used to. I haven't got stairs so haven't rated it for them.
customer_reviews.author: R.Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but good suction
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic suction on this hoover, I thought my carpets were clean, the hair separating brush works very well, I haven't see any hair or threads from my sewing wrapped around brush. Only downside is the weight, it is very heavy and difficult to manover around the room, overall pleased with it even though it will be building up my arm muscles!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi M

customer_reviews.title: Love this hoover!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this since Christmas & wanted to take time to review it. I absolutely love it. The suction is amazing and I love the lift away part of it. Have the anti hair wrap has been a life saver as I shed hair so much! It is so easy to set up and disconnect all the bits. I personally love the lights on it as when I’m hovering at dusk I can see in all the books and crannies that my overhead lights can’t see. My one criticism is it is a bit heavy, an older person may struggle. But it’s not enough for me not to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Best Hoover ever
customer_reviews.text: I'd been using a Henry Hoover for years, but it wasn't up to task when we got a new dog. Really gets the fine dog hair out of the carpet pile. I'm amazed how much it gets up from what appears to be a clean carpet. Very light to use 9n the stairs to, thanks to being able to lift the vacuum part of the chassis. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Jones

customer_reviews.title: So convenient - makes housework a much easier/speedier process!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to use. It's on a ball so great for going round corners. Amazing suction power - I've never seen the carpet look so clean, before. Just it's physical design is so convenient and has so many different uses for different tasks. It's made boring housework a much easier and speedier process. It's great for picking up hair as mine is long and thick (and tends to get everywhere) and my previous vacuum struggled to pick it up, off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia stent

customer_reviews.title: Great hoover
customer_reviews.text: Great hoover. Was skeptical as so much hype round these hoover at the mo but it's lived up to it so far. Had it about a month now and not stopped using it, it's amazing how much it gets up. Small dust collector but takes a second to empty so far really pleased and with every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah l pelling

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy and disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Iv just bought this item. I have to say I am a bit disappointed with it. It is so heavy! I tht it was going to be a bit lighter than my other vacuum cleaners . It doesn't get fully up to the edges of the carpets and floors. The slot that is supposed to secure the tube, doesn't and it keeps popping out. I wish I had spent a bit more money and got a cordless lightweight cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: MRS TRUDI J ROBINSON

customer_reviews.title: Worth paying more for such a great hoover as this one!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic hoover this is! Put together in less than a couple of minutes, carpets look brand new again. I didnt realise my old Vax was so rubbish in comparison to this vacuum cleaner. Huge saving on the price too and the monthly payments plan with no interest charged is fantastic also. Highly recommended, worth spending more for the quality you get.
customer_reviews.author: ycnex865

customer_reviews.title: good hover
customer_reviews.text: we had an old shark , brush wore out so replaced it with this new model, great performance and good quality. it's a bit heavier than the old one, and the brush head is not as wide but it picks up well. The compartment for the dirt is also smaller but still can hover all house before emptying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd had one years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how easy this is to use, it picks up all my hair, the cat hairs and bits from my sewing in one sweep. The hand held cleaning on the stairs is a piece of cake as well. The dust box may be small but is so easy to empty I can do that in my kitchen bin.
customer_reviews.author: hexy53

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum Cleaner Ever
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant vacuum cleaner, if I had stairs it would be a doddle. It's brilliant at picking up everything, including hair. Just like the advert, hair is no problem. It's very lightweight, powerful and easy to use. Great value for money
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: Shark hoover review
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, this is amazing. The power of the suction is brilliant, beats my dyson hands down. I wanted a hoover that was versatile and good for stairs, i did worry after having a shot of a cordless shark, and im so glad i opted for this corded one as in my opinion its far better than a cordless one for suction. I do find it a bit heavy but you do get used to it! Fantastic hoover all round.
customer_reviews.author: Donsbabe

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best & most efficient vacuum cleaner I have ever owned! It’s cleaning power is amazing. I have a small dog & her hairs are no issue for the Shark! The only teeny tiny down side is that I find it quite heavy but all the parts are detachable so I can reach curtain poles & light fittings easily. Do not hesitate to buy this vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome suction
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My 3rd Shark vac and this little beauty sucks like a demon. Not tried a full house vacuum but it was impressive in my main kitchen / diner making short work of sand, grit and dog hair. Smaller head is good for getting under bits of furniture and the LED lights operate in both carpet and hard floor mode (unlike my previous Shark). Really hoping this one stands the test of time
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hadfield

customer_reviews.title: Advanced tech!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I was extremely surprised by how powerful this vacuum is, our previous Henry hoover could not remove all the pet hair from our stairs but this one did it effortlessly. Only thing that would make this better was if it had a longer power cable and bigger waste storage.
customer_reviews.author: Zara Salvatore

customer_reviews.title: Dog hair-tangle-free roller!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to keep carpet clear of long hairs from my Border Collie has always been a challenge, not to mention the horrible job of detangling any roller (Dyson in my case) of tangled, tightly wrapped knots of hair. Not any more. I received the Shark yesterday and I'm really impressed with the suction power. Until you use it, you won't believe how much additional dog hair and dust comes out of what you thought was a well-vacuumed carpet. ALL of the hair went into the cylinder so no having to pull out hairs from the roller and the suction power raises the carpet pile and makes it look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Dyson no more!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hoover I have ever owned. Always been pro Dyson but no more! It’s so user friendly and really cleans hardwood floors & carpets. With the middle section being detachable to hoover stairs and go round skirtings etc, it’s like using a cordless vacuum and has made housework a pleasure. I’m not usually one for writing reviews but I had to give the Shark it’s credit. I would definitely recommend this product however, it may not be suited to everyone as it is ever so slightly heavier to push than the Dyson so just be aware of that but that’s only because it’s doing it’s job well! Defo 5 star rating from me.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: Previous model was better
customer_reviews.text: I have the previous model and it is a much higher quality construction . This one doesn’t maneuver as easily either. It has great suction and is very convenient but the quality has definitely gone down.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Dyson killer
customer_reviews.text: Better than a Dyson. YES Had this a couple of weeks now and can honestly say that this is a great hoover. Easy to use, easy to clean. No bags to empty. We got the mains one. Comes with an attachment that can be used in the car but I've used it for the stairs. Can't recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Davis

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy one sooner?
customer_reviews.text: We love this. Great suction, very easy to use. Nothing is fidgety. It doesnt even scrape the skirting as it's got something at the front to soften this. I have Rheumatoid Arthritis and this is making my life easier as it's easy on the wrists, fingers etc. I didn't hoover the stairs till I got this but now the lift away facility makes it so much easier. Life is so much easier now. Storage is fine too.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: I'm incredibly impressed
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing hover!! Brilliantly thought out. Works like a dream and so many options for use. I got the car cleaning pack too and it's amazing. Easily better then my Dyson so very pleased as it was also £200 cheaper! I'm impressed and we have many cats and deals with the hair no probs!
customer_reviews.author: Pro Photographer

customer_reviews.title: The best by far.
customer_reviews.text: We have, for years only purchased Dyson but the later models are rubbish, made cheaply & poor quality. I researched in detail all currently available upright cleaners & the Shark came out on top. I have had it now for over a month & it is the best vacuum cleaner we have ever had. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Wish I’d had a shark sooner
customer_reviews.text: Love this lightweight vacuum I have previously had Dyson cleaners which have become worse by the model and I wanted to try something else Having read others reviews I thought I’d give shark a go and I’ve not been disappointed The only thing is the dust container is not very big and does need more regular emptying compared to what I’ve had before, however that’s not a bad thing
customer_reviews.author: Marie Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum cleaner. I’ve just used it on my rug and I’m amazed at how much dust and muck came out of it, it hasn’t been vacuumed for a few days. Definitely worth the money. Easy to use, especially on the stairs. I live on my own but I’m gonna be using this every day.
customer_reviews.author: Coleygiz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Amazing vacuum due to it's ability to adapt, cleaning the house is so simple and quick. The suction is amazing and works really well on hard floors and rugs. Best vacuum cleaner I've had so far. One slight criticism though, although it's anti hair wrap hairs still get caught up. Not as bad as my previous vacuum but a few do need cutting out after every clean.
customer_reviews.author: carolvod

customer_reviews.title: Great product but too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great product, nothing to say, only too heavy to go around home, after some though we have to return it and take the cordless one.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio

customer_reviews.title: The Shark Upright Vacuum is powerful at picking up dirt on stairs, carpet and wooden floors.
customer_reviews.text: The Shark Upright Vacuum is powerful at picking up dirt and dust on stairs, carpet and wooden floors. It has strong suction power and it has a light to guide you when you are hoovering in dark places. The only disadvantage would be the shortness of the length of the lead between two rooms, but it really is not a problem. I find this product excellent for the job it does.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline D

customer_reviews.title: Great but has its drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Very good hoover suction-wise, however the lack of a retractable power cord is a real pain and the hoover is heavy to manoeuvre, even when not in lift-away mode. I don’t mind it too much (it’s a workout!) but it would not be suitable for everyone because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Had it a couple of weeks now and I’m really impressed. Great suction, I couldn’t believe the dust, fluff and dogs hair this pulled out of my carpets, bearing in mind I’d only just vacuumed a couple of days before with our old Vax. Moves nicely despite it being quite weighty. The lift away feature is perfect for stairs. Good long lead so you don’t have to keep unplugging and moving it. Seems to be well built with some nice features and gadgets. £200 cheaper than the equivalent Dyson, no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. Welford

customer_reviews.title: Very Good but Heavy
customer_reviews.text: The suction on this is absolutely amazing; I consider myself to be house proud but was shocked at the amount of dust the Shark picked up from my bedroom carpets!! However, it is very heavy to push, and certainly not easy with arthritic hands and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Good value hoover
customer_reviews.text: This is a good Hoover for the price I like how easy it is to empty and clean the Hoover after use. The only thing is I’m small and it has a tall handle and I am left handed so I always want to move the wire to the other side as it’s on the left
customer_reviews.author: donna mcglashan

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade on smelly Miele
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly heavy after the Miele. A bit disappointed with the weight to be honest. everything else seems ok, but it feels like an old fashioned upright again.
customer_reviews.author: Joeythejo

customer_reviews.title: The Shark Tank
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding vac, moved from getting a Henry to a Shark as I wanted bagless and needed brushes. Only downside is there is nowhere to store the pet hair attachment. Moves from carpet to hard surface with a flick of a switch. Turns into a cylinder vac for hard to reach places. Easy to de tangle if it picks up hairbands cable ties etc.
customer_reviews.author: McBonus

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my old Henry. Specifically because we have two dogs and a cat so most of what I clean up is fur. The pet hair attachment is powerful and does the job. The lift away function is great for cleaning the stairs. The switch between hard floor and carpet is an excellent function. I’m very impressed. Bit pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Byrne

customer_reviews.title: First class performance
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum cleaner. I was sceptical about the anti-hair wrap feature but it really does work - I spent ages on my old vacuum cutting away the hair from the rollers with a pair of scissors - but somehow this one does not suffer the same problem. The powered lift-away feature to do stairs is fantastic and he suction is really good. The only minor criticism if I am being hyper-critical is that the dust container is rather small.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: So far, better than the Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 4 year old Dyson, this is in my opinion better than the Dyson, suction is stronger and much quieter. The lift away is so useful and I have used it a lot so far, the brush bar also grooms the carpet much better, and it doesnt get blocked like my old one did.
customer_reviews.author: Lynden Davies

customer_reviews.title: Great hoover, carpets look like new
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews and so glad that I brought this. My previous hoover did a good job but this took it up to the next level. My carpets look nearly new once I’ve used it. It’s actually a pleasure to do my hoovering because I can actually see the difference. Anti wrap hair function is brilliant. Would recommend this hoover.
customer_reviews.author: nicola harper

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: We have two black Labradors & two girls with long hair. Our Dyson after many years of useage died therefore we needed a replacement and after researching we chose this Shark model. The tank is small and it's heavy but works very well. It's much quieter than our Henry & old Dyson too. The front lights are very retro!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, though couple of bad points.
customer_reviews.text: Bit heavier than the 680 pet but god it picks up a hell of a lot more and gives the carpet a good deep clean too! Picks every dog hair up, even the ones that always get stuck between fibres! The brush adapter is cheap and also feels cheap. Should come with a motorised furniture adapter and a decent brush adapter. Better than any Dyson and shark pet hoover.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the box!
customer_reviews.text: Am 100% impressed with this little vacuum - we have long hair/hair extensions & pet hair to contend with and this picked everything up and the roller and pet hair gizmo did not need cleaning/de-stranding! 😀 The hose seems to be more firmly fixed to the pipe than my old one, so that at the moment, is not annoying - may change the more it is used but I can put up with that! Prompt delivery, excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: The hose is very short so awkward for hoovering stairs. The width of the hoover its self is smaller than average so if you have large areas to cover it takes longer. Overall not a bad hoover but not the best either. So pleased i didn't pay full price!
customer_reviews.author: steven laurie

customer_reviews.title: Best in the market
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum cleaner I have ever had. Previously been using Dyson, will never look back. Great quality, anti hair function works well, great with pets and carpets as well as flat surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Piccolo

customer_reviews.title: Versatile vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I like the versatility of the product. The anti hair tangle is not absolute. I have a long haired German Shepherd. The product clears about 70% from the roller still leaving some to remove. Overall I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Woodcock

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it 😀
customer_reviews.text: I love my hoover and I wish I had brought one sooner rather than a Dyson. This hoover transformed my carpets and I am extremely clean person. I will not go back to a Dyson now I’ve experienced a shark. Yes it can be a little heavy but you simply lift away and you are off.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever. A complete life changer in my house.
customer_reviews.text: This hoover is amazing. It has suction like no other , is extremely versatile, converting to its lift away mode in a second. I'm shocked by how much dirt, dust and pet hair that it has lifted even though I regularly hoovered with my other reputable model. It's even lifted the pile on the carpet so it looks like new. Easy to empty and so quick to convert from floors to stairs to ceiling cobwebs. Plus we have noticed a better air quality in our house since using it. It's now named Sharkey and is my new pet.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Jean Emery

customer_reviews.title: "Upgraded" from a Dyson and very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I have had Dyson vacuum cleaners for several years. The one I had finally stopped working after a few years and I checked and read several reviews. At the end I decided to get this one and I am very happy. It is super powerful, versatile to clean hard floors, carpets, under furniture, stairs, etc. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: good vac--bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great--got another shark after last one did us well. this one is as good--but just a bit bulkier/heavier to use
customer_reviews.author: Craig R. Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Very good suction.
customer_reviews.text: This hoover is excellent at suction on the carpets. The handle does not adjust to your height, so if you’re short it’s a bit awkward. And too heavy for me, bought it for my daughter and she’s pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Grocott

product_meta.title: Shark Upright Vacuum Cleaner [NZ801UKT] Powered Lift-Away with Anti Hair Wrap Technology, Pet Hair, Navy & Orange
product_meta.description: Style Name:DuoClean, Anti Hair Wrap with Pet BrushAre you a pet owner looking for a versatile pet vacuum cleaner that’s ideal for picking up hair and glides from carpets to hard floors. Look no further. Shark’s signature DuoClean floor head is now enhanced with Anti Hair Wrap technology. Glide from carpets to hard floors with DuoClean’s double brush-roll design, combining a bristle brush-roll to clean deep into carpets and a soft front brush-roll to actively pull in debris and lift dust from hard floors. Tired of removing tangled hair from your vacuum’s brush-roll Anti Hair Wrap technology actively separates and removes hair with a unique bristle-guard and comb, helping to leave the bristle brush-roll tangle-free. Ideal for long, short and pet hair. Go portable with powered lift-away - Transform into a portable vacuum to comfortably clean stairs, surfaces and under furniture without heavy lifting. Simply lift the main unit away from the wand to instantly transform this versatile upright into a portable vacuum cleaner, for a consistent clean throughout your home. Designed for homes with pets – easily remove embedded pet hair from sofas, stairs and upholstery with the specially-designed True Pet tool, enhanced with Anti Hair Wrap technology. Handy on-board tools - easily vacuum sofas, crevices and surfaces. extended reach easily removes dust from ceilings, curtains and high up. Reassurance for allergy sufferers – Shark’s anti-allergen complete seal captures and traps 99. 9 Percent of dust and allergens inside the vacuum, not releasing them back into the air you breathe. Signature LED headlights illuminate hidden dust under furniture. Based on IEC standard 62885-2 Cl. 5. 11 at 0. 3 to 10 microns.
feature_bullets: DuoClean floor head glides from carpets to hard floors
Anti Hair Wrap actively removes hair from the bristle brush-roll
Transform into a portable vacuum to easily clean stairs, surfaces and under furniture
Suitable for pet owners, easily remove embedded pet hair from sofas and stairs
Includes 3 attachments LED headlights 5-year manufacturer warranty for peace of mind

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,479 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
